2006-02-23

Don't you just love it…

... when someone loves an album as much as you do...


On Fire is one of the great, essential records of rock and roll as a whole, along side such records as the Pixies Doolittle, Sonic Youth's Daydream Nation, and the Beatles Revolver. Grade: A+

the cream of broccoli radio hour: essential record of the day: Galaxie 500--On Fire (1989)
